description: Head straight along the road towards the blue-domed mosque visible in the distance. Pass the blue metal gates on the left and the pink tent on the right. The path ends on the main street, facing the pharmacy sign ahead on the left.
agent_concise_description: Head straight along the road towards the blue-domed mosque visible in the distance. Pass the blue metal gates on the left and the pink tent on the right. The path ends on the main street, facing the pharmacy sign ahead on the left.
